column1: The town of Bilgi is located at 16°20′50″N 075°37′05″E. It has an average elevation of 509 metres (1669 feet).

The taluka covers 782 square kilometres (301.9 sq mi) and lies between 16°-03′ to 16°-32′ north latitude and 75°-73′ to 76°-49′ east longitude. The taluka is bordered by Bijapur Taluka of Bijapur District to the north
column3: Bagalkot Taluka to the south and southeast
column4: and Jamakhandi Taluka to the north. The Krishna River and reservoir form its northern boundary. The National Highway 52 (India) passes near this place.
